law.catch_line: Quorum; Decisions By A Single Member Of Board

text.section: cases on appeal from a board of assessors where the assessed value of the property involved does not exceed $500,000;

cases on appeal from a board of assessors where the assessed value exceeds $500,000 but does not exceed $750,000 when the appellant and appellee gives written consent to a decision by a single member;
cases heard under the informal procedure in which the assessed value is less than $1,000,000 as provided in section 7A or the small claims procedure as provided in section 7B.
